# Unicode.GeneralCategory.nonspacingMark

**Case**

A non-spacing combining mark with zero advance width (abbreviated Mn).

## Declaration

```swift
case nonspacingMark
```

## Discussion

This value corresponds to the category `Nonspacing_Mark` (abbreviated `Mn`) in the [https://unicode.org/reports/tr44/#General_Category_Values].
title: Unicode.GeneralCategory.nonspacingMark
